metadata.title: CVE-2017-6076 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In versions of wolfSSL before 3.10.2 the function fp_mul_comba makes iteasier to extract RSA key information for a malicious user who has accessto view cache on a machine.

criterions.comment: wolfssl: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
